headline: Fortive (FTV) Is Up 13.4% After Strong Q4, Upbeat 2026 EPS Outlook And Buybacks - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In early February 2026, Fortive reported fourth-quarter 2025 results with sales of US$1,122.5 million, adjusted EPS of US$0.90, and full-year sales of US$4,159.1 million, while also executing substantial share repurchases under its ongoing buyback programs. Beyond the headline beats, Fortive’s earnings mix showed growing strength in its Intelligent Operating Solutions and Advanced Healthcare Solutions segments, supported by rising recurring and software-driven revenue, and management issued...
